Information Broker Bavarin: Dammit, Sharon! I came here for a rest, but I keep having to deal with customers! Could you please handle them from now on? So, what do you want? You're here for the grail of splendor, aren't you? How do I know that? Well, I have my ways... You're too late! I already sold that information to the Benandanti Cartel. Made a pretty penny, too, I must say! Of course, I'm perfectly willing to give you the same information for the right price. Ha!
